title: LIES!
body: My profile level says 10 but im level 39{{champion:498}}

replies.body:
All it takes is a vote/comment somewhere on the Boards (DtB and H&S you can do this at level 1) and your profile will be synced shortly. Since you've made a comment here it looks like your profile is updated now, so enjoy! Make sure you're familiar with the [Universal Rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules) and the individual sub-board's guidelines before posting.

Players can also visit the Boards Profile Syncing Tools pinned on top of the [Help & Support](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/osqw6G4M) sub-board and Home page.
Nothing but lies... Lies, lies, lies, lies, LIES!
